attributes.action: repatriate muslims who were not born in gb
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like too see muslims who were not born in gb sent back to there country of origin to try to cut down on the number of terrorist cells because they obviously dont take any notice of our laws and general live and let live policy so they dont deserve our protection

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
